meanings: (기립하다) stand up, rise to one's feet
(분기하다) bestir oneself, brace oneself up, rise (against, up)

vlive.korean: 얘들이 사람인가 봐요 두 발로 일어서! I guess they are people. They stand on two feet! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: I guess they are people. They stand on two feet!

vlive.korean: 강압적으로 - 일어서! Like he's forcing people to stand up! - "Stand up!" 듣기 View video CASPER RADIO : 권정열 고영배의 십란한밤 #120 with 첸(CHEN) of 엑소(EXO)
vlive.english: Like he's forcing people to stand up! - "Stand up!"

vlive.korean: [왜 일어나는지는 아무도 모름;;] 일어서요 일어서요. Stand up, stand up. 듣기 View video ATEEZ : ATEEZ(에이티즈) WANTED 2화
[힘과 힘의 대결] 일어서! [Power vs power] Get up! 듣기 View video 1THE9(원더나인) : 원더나인(1THE9) - 원더랜드(WONDERLAND) EP.3
[빵 들고] - 일어서세요! - 일어서? Stand up! - Stand up? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : ATEEZ(에이티즈) WANTED 2화

examples.korean: That is why, no matter how desperate the predicament is, I am always very much in earnest about clutching my cane, straightening my derby hat and fixing my tie, even though I have just landed on my head. (Charlie Chaplin) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아무리 큰 역경이 닥쳐오더라도, 비록 고꾸라져 땅에 머리를 찧었을지라도, 그것이 바로 내가 지팡이를 짚고 일어서 중산모를 바로 잡고 넥타이를 바로 멜 수 있는 이유다. (찰리 채플린, 도전명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: That is why, no matter how desperate the predicament is, I am always very much in earnest about clutching my cane, straightening my derby hat and fixing my tie, even though I have just landed on my head. (Charlie Chaplin) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A storm in Boston held up our plane. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 보스톤에 폭풍이 일어서 우리 비행기가 지연되었다. Neungyule
examples.english: A storm in Boston held up our plane. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: One woman is seated while another is standing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 한 여자는 앉아 있고, 다른 여자는 일어서 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: One woman is seated while another is standing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Now, I say to you today my friends, even though we face the difficulties of today and tomorrow, I still have a dream. It is a dream deeply rooted in the American dream. I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: - 'We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal.' (Martin Luther King Jr.) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오늘 형제 여러분에게 말씀드립니다, 지금도 그렇고 앞으로도 우리는 많은 어려움을 겪어야겠지만 나에게는 여전히 꿈이 있습니다. 그것은 아메리칸 드림에 깊이 뿌리내리고 있는 꿈입니다. 나에게는 꿈이 있습니다, 언젠가 이 나라가 우뚝 일어서, "모든 사람은 평등하게 창조되었고, 우리가 바로 그 증거이다"라는 건국의 원칙의 참뜻에 맞게 살아갈 것이라는 꿈입니다. (마틴 루터 킹, 희망명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Now, I say to you today my friends, even though we face the difficulties of today and tomorrow, I still have a dream. It is a dream deeply rooted in the American dream. I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: - 'We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal.' (Martin Luther King Jr.) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I can't see anything because everyone is standing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다들 일어서 있으니까 아무것도 안 보여요. Neungyule
examples.english: I can't see anything because everyone is standing. Add to Wordbook
